job_tasks.phrase: Analyseren en verwerken van complexe data
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the process of analyzing and processing data, which is a core component of data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: gebruikt machine learning, data mining en deep learning-technologieën om waardevolle inzichten te genereren
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions machine learning, data mining, and deep learning technologies used for generating insights, which falls under the modeling task category.

job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkelen van voorspellende modellen: Met statistische modellen en algoritmes onthul je verborgen patronen in data en maak je toekomstvoorspellingen mogelijk.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the development of predictive models using statistical models and algorithms, directly aligning with the definition of the Modeling task.

job_tasks.phrase: Bouwen van end-to-end oplossingen: Je creëert niet alleen Proof of Concepts (PoC's), maar ontwikkelt robuuste oplossingen die direct in productie kunnen worden gebruikt.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase refers to building end-to-end solutions and developing robust solutions for production use, which aligns with software development aspects of delivering AI solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Operationaliseren van AI-modellen: Je zorgt ervoor dat je oplossingen schaalbaar en toepasbaar zijn in de praktijk, inclusief deployment en monitoring.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes operationalizing AI models, including scalability, deployment, and monitoring, which are key aspects of MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: helpen van klanten om complexe data te begrijpen en te benutten. Je combineert technische expertise met innovatie om oplossingen te ontwikkelen die bedrijven transformeren.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights helping clients understand and utilize complex data and developing solutions that transform businesses, indicating an understanding of business context and needs.

job_tasks.phrase: verder de inhoud in te duiken? (verdiepen in expertise)
job_tasks.justification: While short, 'verdiepen in expertise' suggests a focus on deepening knowledge which can be applied to understanding business problems in detail.

job_tasks.phrase: Samenwerken binnen het AI-team: Je werkt samen met het Center of Excellence (CoE) of direct met de klant om hoogwaardige oplossingen te realiseren
job_tasks.justification: This phrase emphasizes collaboration to realize high-quality solutions, which involves the software development aspect of delivering functional products.

soft_skills.phrase: Samen met een enthousiast divers team werkt aan uitdagende klantprojecten
krijgt de ruimte om jezelf verder te ontwikkelen en verder de inhoud in te duiken. (verdiepen in expertise)
Samenwerken binnen het AI-team: Je werkt samen met het Center of Excellence (CoE) of direct met de klant
helpen van klanten om complexe data te begrijpen en te benutten. [...] ontwikkelen innovatieve oplossingen.

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes developing predictive models, analyzing and processing complex data using machine learning, data mining, and deep learning. While there are elements of operationalizing models (MLOps) and building end-to-end solutions, the core focus remains on the modeling and data analysis aspects, aligning with the 'ML Engineer' profile.
